cls

Class Altimeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cls.Altimeter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    input.EventHandler 

    public class Altimeter
extends java.lang.Object
implements input.EventHandler
    Shows the aircraft's height in feet (whatever units you want). And the current banking of the aircraft.
    Author:
    Huw Taylor
